common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Use this api to get package detail.

error_list.name: error_permission
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}.

error_list.name: error_server
error_list.description: System error. Please try again later.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: The information you queried is not found.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The set of package_number. If there are multiple package_number, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

","name":"package_number_list","sample":"OFG1156498731071468,OFG199593509207187","type":"string","required":"True","key":"BzXswHS"}],"response_params":[{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"CfdxSiY"},{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"RMDhQsT"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DZmJWYw"},{"description":"

Detail informations you are querying.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"ePTpNsY","children":[{"description":"

The list of packages.

","name":"package_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"rkETehM","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

","name":"order_sn","sample":"220831EGF1JMXF","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MkjkiXR"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

","name":"package_number","sample":"OFG1156498731071468","type":"string","required":null,"key":"HQaepTw"},{"description":"

The Shopee fulfillment status for the package. Applicable values: See V2.0 Data Definition - PackageFulfillmentStatus.

","name":"fulfillment_status","sample":"LOGISTICS_READY","type":"string","required":null,"key":"MchWfFC"},{"description":"

Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of package.

","name":"update_time","sample":"1661950674","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"xkXteWb"},{"description":"

The identity of logistic channel.

","name":"logistics_channel_id","sample":"80008","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"nFWnANj"},{"description":"

The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the package to deliver items. If logistics_channel_id is 90021 or 90026, service_code will be appended.

","name":"shipping_carrier","sample":"JNE Trucking (JTR) LPS","type":"string","required":null,"key":"tEehzjE"},{"description":"

To indicate whether the package allows for self-designed AWB, if allow_self_design_awb returns false, it means that the package does not allow for self-designed AWB and only the system-AWB can be used.

","name":"allow_self_design_awb","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"HaWJpbK"},{"description":"

Shipping preparation time set by the seller when listing item on Shopee.

","name":"days_to_ship","sample":"3","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"NEaJYFG"},{"description":"

The deadline to ship out the package.

","name":"ship_by_date","sample":"1662209873","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"GMfQyEY"},{"description":"

The list of pending terms, possible values: SYSTEM_PENDING for order under Shopee internal processing, KYC_PENDING for order under KYC checking(TW CB order only)

","name":"pending_terms","sample":"","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"xtpRAGE"},{"description":"

The tracking number of this package.

","name":"tracking_number","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"rSyszfN"},{"description":"

[TW only] Tracking number expiration date

","name":"tracking_number_expiration_date","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"epMYDS"},{"description":"

The timestamp when pickup is done.

","name":"pickup_done_time","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"Qidatba"},{"description":"

To indicate whether this parcel is split.

","name":"is_split_up","sample":"false","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"zwBiejt"},{"description":"

The lis of items in the package.

","name":"item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"EnebhQH","children":[{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

","name":"item_id","sample":"2200149592","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"NFShsAj"},{"description":"

Shopee's unique identifier for a model.

","name":"model_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"cdfWfQC"},{"description":"

A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

","name":"item_sku","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GiNEWsQ"},{"description":"

ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

","name":"model_sku","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"hNhQeHC"},{"description":"

The number of identical items/variations purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

","name":"model_quantity","sample":"1","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"CdkJTx"},{"description":"

The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

","name":"order_item_id","sample":"2200149592","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tSidBkR"},{"description":"

The identify of product promotion.

","name":"promotion_group_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"aaZTTmM"},{"description":"

The warehouse ID of the item.

","name":"product_location_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"XKYWsty"},{"description":"

An identifier of teleconsultation session which buyer did to order this item. Empty if item is not ordered through teleconsultation session

","name":"consultation_id","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"BNHwrsr"}]},{"description":"

This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address.
Different parameters might be masked according to each market and kind of seller.

For TW region integrated channel orders will be all masked as \"****\". More details may refer the announcement.

","name":"recipient_address","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"ZweCtH","children":[{"description":"

Recipient's name for the address.

","name":"name","sample":"b***r","type":"string","required":null,"key":"PeCFRQr"},{"description":"

Recipient's phone number input when order was placed.

[Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return \"****\" when the \"virtual_contact_number\" is available

","name":"phone","sample":"******78","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JmyeEDZ"},{"description":"

The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

","name":"town","sample":"****","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ZwYeKmM"},{"description":"

The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

","name":"district","sample":"****","type":"string","required":null,"key":"scQNaxW"},{"description":"

The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

","name":"city","sample":"****","type":"string","required":null,"key":"CNKidcC"},{"description":"

The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

","name":"state","sample":"****","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JDcaFFP"},{"description":"

The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

","name":"region","sample":"****","type":"string","required":null,"key":"WBPREnM"},{"description":"

Recipient's postal code.

","name":"zipcode","sample":"****","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JEakWsK"},{"description":"

The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

","name":"full_address","sample":"******11","type":"string","required":null,"key":"pYfxQNR"},{"description":"

Geolocation info. Only available for logistics_channel_id 90026.

","name":"geolocation","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"MnnEQWN","children":[{"description":"

Latitude.

","name":"latitude","sample":"-23.567851","type":"float","required":null,"key":"NxsnArZ"},{"description":"

Longitude.

","name":"longitude","sample":"-46.6912611","type":"float","required":null,"key":"pDjxhDW"}]}]},{"description":"

display weight used to calculate ASF for this parcel

","name":"parcel_chargeable_weight_gram","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"KMHWRcr"},{"description":"

The common identifier for multiple orders combined in the same parcel.

","name":"group_shipment_id","sample":"","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"yxjzDSJ"},{"description":"

[Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

","name":"virtual_contact_number","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fzeQSdP"},{"description":"

[Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this package.

","name":"package_query_number","sample":"false","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jBiGWNb"},{"description":"

[Only for TW 30029 channel] This field indicate the sorting group value of the package. This field is only available for logistics_channel_id = 30029 and after the package has been arranged for shipment.

","name":"sorting_group","sample":"North","type":"string","required":null,"key":"JCwPWMa"},{"description":"

Return prescription images of this order, only for ID and PH whitelist sellers.


Please add the prefix to review:

for ID: https://cf.shopee.co.id/file/+prescription_image

for PH: https://cf.shopee.ph/file/+prescription_image

","name":"prescription_images","sample":"","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"jaAYjxD"},{"description":"

Name of the Pharmacist for Prescription Order.

","name":"pharmacist_name","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"NENybyQ"},{"description":"

Time of when the prescription is approved.

","name":"prescription_approval_time","sample":"","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"DRJTDwy"},{"description":"

Time of when the prescription is rejected.

","name":"prescription_rejection_time","sample":"","type":"timestamp","required":null,"key":"PPfQQwE"},{"description":"

To indicate if this order is buyer self collection at store order.

","name":"is_buyer_shop_collection","sample":"","type":"boolean","required":null,"key":"PiSpKAD"},{"description":"

The image url of the proof for buyer self collection at the store.

","name":"buyer_proof_of_collection","sample":"","type":"string[]","required":null,"key":"eeeYfEH"}]}]},{"description":"

Indicate warning message you should take care.

","name":"warning","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GktaWcA"}]}

update_log_list.content: Add geolocation response fields under recipient_address for BR 90026 channel, and update the shipping_carrier logic for BR 90021 and 90026 to include service_code

Support Prescription and Self Collect at the Store (Add prescription_images, consultation_id, pharmacist_name, prescription_approval_time, prescription_rejection_time, is_buyer_shop_collection, buyer_proof_of_collection response fields)
